short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize useful Windows and Linux commands and shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Command Snippets is a Chrome browser extension designed to help developers and system administrators quickly save, organize, and access command-line snippets for Windows, Linux, and cross-platform environments. The tool offers features as - 

 Categorized command storage (Git, System, Network, etc.)
 Add custom command snippets
 OS-specific command filtering

The extension provides a user-friendly interface for managing frequently used commands, making it easier for technical professionals to reference and reuse complex or commonly used terminal commands.
